${ModID}:MissileStrike.NAME: Missile Strike
${ModID}:MissileStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage to 所有敌人。

${ModID}:MagicDart.NAME: Magic Dart
${ModID}:MagicDart.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your h并size。
${ModID}:MagicDart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL Deal damage equal to your h并size。

${ModID}:Cull.NAME: Cull
${ModID}:Cull.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL EVERYONE 失去s !M! 生命。

${ModID}:Potential.NAME: Potential
${ModID}:Potential.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_生命。 NL 抽 !${ModID}:m2! card. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:Potential.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Temporary_生命。 NL 抽 !${ModID}:m2! 张牌。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Aura.NAME: Aura
${ModID}:Aura.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would 失去 生命。

${ModID}:MAXPOWER.NAME: MAX POWER
${ModID}:MAXPOWER.DESCRIPTION: Raise your 力量 NL to 11。

${ModID}:Flow.NAME: Flow
${ModID}:Flow.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If the last card played 本回合 was an Attack, 抽 !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:Manaburst.NAME: Manaburst
${ModID}:Manaburst.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add a random 0-cost Attack from your 弃牌堆 to your hand。
${ModID}:Manaburst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add !M! random 0-cost Attacks from your 弃牌堆 to your hand。

${ModID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${ModID}:Dominate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Stun 所有敌人. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:IchorGoblet.NAME: Ichor Goblet
${ModID}:IchorGoblet.DESCRIPTION: 获得 [E] at the start of next !M! turns. If you 失去 生命, 获得 it all immediately。
